Hardly Any Python, Hardly Any Cry

2012-11-20

Hey! News from the time wasting department: This blog is now available under a new URL: http://r-wos.org/blog/. The old links should get a 301 redirect here, though. Hope that works for everybody. Don’t ask how the redirect is implemented - trust me, you don’t want to know.

Also, the blog’s now generated by an ugly little Racket program (it was formally generated by an ugly little Python program). Well, actually, Racket doesn’t have a Markdown parser yet, so that part’s still done with Python. Don’t ask. You really don’t want to know.

I hope the RSS readers can cope with a 301 redirect. I hope the RSS is still working. I hope I can move the Disqus comments. I hope I can fix the encoding errors.

And I hope I remember why I did this again.
